member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor
member.summary: Contains functionality to process all language expressions in ARM templates. Generates placeholder values when parameter values are not provided.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.ResourceMappings
member.summary: Mapping between resources in the expanded template to their original resource in the original template. Used to get line numbers. The key is the path in the expanded template with value being the path in the original template.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Constructor for the ARM Template Processing library
member.param: The ARM Template JSON. Must follow this schema: https://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/2019-04-01/deploymentTemplate.json#
The deployment API version. Must be a valid version from the deploymetns list here: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/templates/microsoft.resources/allversions
A logger to report errors and debug information

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.ProcessTemplate
member.summary: Processes the ARM template with placeholder parameters and deployment metadata.
member.returns: The processed template as a JSON object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.ProcessTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Processes the ARM template with provided parameters and placeholder deployment metadata.
member.param: The template parameters and their values JSON. Must follow this schema: https://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/2015-01-01/deploymentParameters.json#
member.returns: The processed template as a JSON object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.ProcessTemplate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Processes the ARM template with provided parameters and deployment metadata.
member.param: The template parameters and their values JSON. Must follow this schema: https://schema.management.azure.com/schemas/2015-01-01/deploymentParameters.json#
The deployment metadata JSON.
member.returns: The processed template as a JSON object.

member.param: The template parameters
The deployment metadata
member.returns: The processed template as a Template object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.ProcessResourcesAndOutputs(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.Template)
member.summary: Processes each resource for language expressions and parent resources as well as processes language expressions for outputs.
member.param: Template being processed.
member.returns: Template after processing resources and outputs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.CopyResourceDependants(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.TemplateResource)
member.summary: Copies child resources into sub resources for parent resources.
member.param: The child resource.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.SaveFlattenedResources(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.TemplateResource[],System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Flattens resources that are defined inside other resources.
member.param: Resources in the template.
Name of the parent resource. Used during recursive call.
Type of the parent resource. Used during recursive call.
Path of the parent resource in the expanded template. Used during the recursive call.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.ProcessTemplateResourceLanguageExpressions(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.TemplateResource,Azure.Deployments.Templates.Expressions.TemplateExpressionEvaluationHelper)
member.summary: Processes language expressions in the properties property of the resources.
member.param: The template resource to process language expressions for.
Evaluation helper to evaluate expressions

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.GetTemplateFunctionEvaluationHelper(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.Template)
member.summary: Gets the template expression evaluation helper.
member.param: The template.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.MapTopLevelResources(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.Template,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.ValueTuple{System.String,System.Int32}})
member.summary: Maps the resources to their original location.
member.param: The template
Mapping of the copy name, the original name of the resource, and index of resource in resource list.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.SetOriginalResourceNames(Azure.Deployments.Core.Definitions.Schema.Template)
member.summary: Set the original name property for each resource before processing language expressions in the template. This is used to help map to the original resource after processing.
member.param: The template

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.PopulateDeploymentMetadata(System.String)
member.summary: Populates the deployment metadata data object.
member.param: The deployment metadata JSON.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.ArmTemplateProcessor.PopulateParameters(System.String)
member.param: The required input parameters and their values JSON.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.PlaceholderInputGenerator
member.summary: Generates placeholder values for required inputs to process templates

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.PlaceholderInputGenerator.GeneratePlaceholderParameters(System.String)
member.summary: Generates placeholder parameters when no default value is specified in the ARM Template.
member.param: The ARM Template to generate parameters for JSON.
member.returns: The Json string of the placeholder parameter values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.TemplateProcessor.PlaceholderInputGenerator.GeneratePlaceholderDeploymentMetadata
member.summary: Returns the deployment metadata with placeholder data. Use this if you do not rely on the deployment metadata.
